mapper.sql: t.id, t.user_id, t.org_code, t.patient_id, t.name, t.sex_code, t.birth_date, t.abo_code, t.rh_code, t.id_type_code, t.id_no, t.mobile_phone, t.marriage_code, t.nationality_code, t.card_type_code, t.card_no, t.drug_allergy_mark, t.last_update_dtime
mapper.delete: delete from user_info where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info ( user_id, org_code, patient_id, name, sex_code, birth_date, abo_code, rh_code, id_type_code, id_no, mobile_phone, marriage_code, nationality_code, card_type_code, card_no, drug_allergy_mark, last_update_dtime ) values( #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sexCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aboCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rhCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nationalityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugAllergyMark,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
